reviews.review: Конченая игра стала за последнее время, хитбоксы кривые, не засчитывает попадания в тело в голову.. или вообще мимо летит.

CSGO is a very popular FPS that has inspired a ton of other games. That being said, not a fan. I prefer games like Insurgency, Squad, and Battlefield that combine fun components of video games with realism. CSGO feels very arcadey (which is by design) and you really have to have good muscle memory for recoil patterns to get to a high level in competitive. The matchmaking system is also completely broken and people several ranks higher than you will be placed in your game. CSGO also has a notoriously toxic community filled with trolls and smurf accounts.
